name: site_privacy
title: User Privacy
subtitle: Your privacy is very important for us. Accordingly, we have developed this **Policy** for you to understand how we collect, use, communicate and disclose and make use of personal information. In order to ensure that the confidentiality of personal information is protected and maintained, we will adhere to the following outlines.

children.title: Data Privacy and Personal Information
children.subtitle: According to the E.U **G.D.P.R** regulation laws, we provide the following information and practices:
contents: - We will collect personal information in a digital database managed by volBrain administrators.

- We will collect and use personal information solely with the objective of fulfilling those purposes specified by us and for other compatible purposes, unless we obtain the consent of the individual concerned or as required by law.

- We will only retain personal information as long as necessary for the fulfillment of those purposes. Moreover, as specified by the French law on “computer and freedom”, you can have access to your personal information and you can modify them by contacting volBrain administrators.
- We will make readily available to our users information about our policies and practices relating to the management of personal information.
- We will not sell, rent or otherwise share personal information with any third parties.
